title: TT Beginner Bot Games
body:
I have now had 2 bot games that were over 7 minutes that I got no XP for.  Did something get broken?  I did get FWotD on one but it showed 0 base xp.  The other one I had an XP boost and it showed negative base xp to get me to 0 overall.  This is really annoying.  Please fix this.

Edit:  This seems to happen with games a little over 7 minutes.  The two I described above were just about 7:15, I just played an 14:32 game and it worked fine.

replies.body:
Coop vs AI games will give lower XP depending on your level:

Level 30: Bots grant 75% XP (55% after 180 minutes each day).

You won't receive XP if you are marked as a leaver, but there's been some visual issues not showing XP received as well.  Let me know which game specifically you didn't get XP at all and I'd be happy to check it out for you.  Otherwise, more info is also available in our [XP Breakdown](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824) guide!

This one:
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2660284883/39872503?tab=overview
or 
https://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2660284883/39872503?tab=overview

That second one the account is level 8 so I know being to high isn't the problem.  The first one I got FWotD and that is all and the second one I literally got no XP.

Thanks for your help!
You got 400 XP in this match.  Damn, nice! :D
That is just the first win of the day.  I got no base xp.  I should get 400 plus 50 or so base XP.

Hey, you're right!  So I checked into this and it looks like the match was too fast.  I asked our game team, and it seems like the match needs to have lasted at least 8 minutes to be eligible for the XP.  Sorry for the confusion, I missed this myself.  ><

Just got a reply on a ticket I submitted.  Games apperently have to last 8 minutes now but the FAQ still says 7 and I am pretty sure this wasn't communicated in the patch notes or anything which is pretty ridiculous.
Sorry I posted this under the wrong account but this is me I promise!
